      • Serialized Fields

          JPanel buttonPanel
          The subpanel for buttons providing options at the end of the game.

          JButton continueGame

          JLabel endLabel
          Label displaying information about the game ending and options.

          JButton exit
          Button to exit the game.

          JButton menu
          Button to go back to the main menu (visible if the goal points are reached).

    • Class graphics.ExchangePanel

      class ExchangePanel extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • exchangeButton
          JButton exchangeButton
          The button to execute the card exchange process.
        • exchangeCnt
          int exchangeCnt
          Counter to track the number of exchanges made.
        • exchangeIdxs
          Integer[] exchangeIdxs
          Array of integers representing the indices of cards available for exchange.
        • exchangePanelParts
          JPanel[] exchangePanelParts
          The subpanels for different parts of the exchange process.
        • exchangesMade
          int[] exchangesMade
          Array to store the indices of cards selected for exchange by each player.
        • giveCardLabel
          JLabel[] giveCardLabel
          Labels indicating the instructions for each card exchange.
        • giveCardOptions
          ArrayList<JComboBox<Integer>> giveCardOptions
          List of ComboBoxes for each player to select cards for exchange.
        • panelForExchangeBox
          JPanel[] panelForExchangeBox
          The subpanels containing components for each card exchange box.

    • Class graphics.WishPanel

      class WishPanel extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • wishAsk
          JLabel wishAsk
          Label prompting the player to choose if they want to wish for a number.
        • wishButton
          JButton wishButton
          Button for confirming and submitting the wish.
        • wishComboBox
          JComboBox<Object> wishComboBox
          ComboBox for selecting the value to wish for.
        • wishOptions
          Object[] wishOptions
          Array of wish options, including no wish ('-'), numbers 2-10, and face cards (J, Q, K, A).
        • wishPanelParts
          JPanel[] wishPanelParts
          Array of sub-panels to organize components within the main panel.
